overview: 'Whose Cheek Is This?' is a short experimental film larded with documentary and autobiographical elements, in the absence of lies.  A love triangle between Eleonore Van Godtsenhoven (27), Stine Sampers (24) and Ezra Fieremans (23).  On the projection of images and ideas – the shifting of personal borders – the representation of a past – colour, innocence, love, and sex.  And everybody thought that Eleonore was innocent…
title: Whose Cheek Is This?
